articles.content: The Division Bench of the Delhi High Court accepted an appeal by SpiceJet and its Chairman and Managing Director (CMD), Ajay Singh, challenging a single bench's order to refund over 270 crore to Kala… [+2508 chars]

articles.title: TVS Apache RTR 160 2V Black Edition launched at Rs. 1,20420 - BikeWale
articles.description: TVS has launched the Apache RTR 160 in a new Black Edition variant. The bike features a brand-new paint scheme where the entire bodywork is painted, well, black. This gives the Apache RTR 160 a stealth appearance and highlights its sharp design even more.
articles.content:
- Gets a new all-black paint scheme
- Features LED illumination, three ride modes, and more
- Powered by a 160cc single-cylinder oil-cooled engine
